name: Deborah Adventures: Mr. Fear
description:
Deborah Howard is a treasure hunter working for "We аre Everywhere", on a mission to scout the backwater island "L". In this island there is a secret treasure of pirates, but what is more interesting is that the former group of scouts disappeared without a trace in this island. What happened to them and what this island hides, a group of scouts will have to find out.

FEATURES

  • Standard visual, but pretty good story
  • Dozens of levels with different tasks

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

  1.  Choose the version with your preferred language.
  2.  Download File
  3.  Extract File
  4.  Open Folder and Click Game.exe
  5.  Enjoy the game
